Message:
To begin our investigation of
the Holy Night’s miracle,
Stella and I visited a shop
specializing in magical tomes, but...

“Whoa, this is so cool!
I knew I could count on you
to find some good leads,
Master Merlyn!”

Stella was completely enamored
by the countless number
of magical tomes before her.

Hehe, it’s nice to
see her so excited.
In the meantime,
I should get started
on my research.

Oh...! Apparently,
the Holy Night was
originally celebrated
in order to offer thanks to God.

And over time,
the holiday evolved
into one to express gratitude
to those you cherish.

But, there’s nothing written here
about miracles...

“A long-lost secret art...
Powerful magic from the
ancient legends of yore,
harnessed to summon
miracles from God...

Stella seemed even more excited
that there wasn’t much
written down, though...

Watching her relish in the task
of uncovering a mystery
reminds me of when
I first started studying magic.

I wonder if my eyes sparkled
like hers back then.

Wait a minute!
My master was
pretty knowledgeable about
old legends and the like.
I might be able to find more leads
in her library back home.

And it has been a while,
so maybe I should go visit...
